summary: Present days. A man and his companion go on a journey to cremate the dead body of the former beloved wife, on a riverbank in the area where they spent their honeymoon.
cast: Igor Sergeev|Yuriy Tsurilo|Yuliya Aug|Viktor Sukhorukov|Vyacheslav Melekhov|Larisa Domaskina|Yuliya Tushina|Ivan Tushin|Elizaveta Sitdikova|Olga Dobrina|Sergey Yarmolyuk|Olga Gileva|Artyom Khabibulin|Viktor Gerrat
title: Ovsyanki
